title: Foundational Analysis of Learning Factors for Improving Large-Scale Online Mathematics Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary arithmetic operations and simple problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-centered supplementary learning tools in limited-technology environments. Requires strengthening practical math competencies for job seekers and students balancing studies

learning_goals: Learners can explain self-efficacy and learning immersion enhancement strategies and apply them to practical projects
Learners can analyze the impact of instructional clarity on learning outcomes and propose improvement measures
Learners can design learning environments that foster intrinsic motivation during mathematical problem-solving processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
